Create a coordinate variable

Source: R/bi_write.R
create_coord_var.Rd

Create a coordinate variable

Usage

create_coord_var(
  name,
  dims,
  dim_factors,
  coord_dim,
  index_table,
  ns_dim,
  time_dim,
  nr_column,
  value_column
)

Arguments

name

Name of the variable

dims

Dimensions of all variables

dim_factors

Factors of all dimensions

coord_dim

Coordinate dimension

index_table

data.table with index columns

ns_dim

ns dimension

time_dim

time dimension

nr_column

nr column

value_column

value column

Value

a list with information on the coordinate variable

Details

Creates a coordinate variable with associated dimensions

Author

Sebastian Funk

On this page

Developed by Pierre E. Jacob, Sebastian Funk.
